Verses: 1 appozhudhu Aagaai Theerkkadharisiyum, Iththovin Kumaaranaagiya Sagariyaa Ennum Theerkkadharisiyum, Yoodhaavilum Erusalemilumulla Yoodharukku Isravel Dhevanin Naamaththile Theerkkadharisanam Sonnaargal.

2 appozhudhu Seyalththiyelin Kumaaranaagiya Serubaabelum Yosadhaakkin Kumaaranaagiya Yesuvaavum Ezhumbi, Erusalemilulla Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththaik Kattaththodanginaargal; Avargalukkuth Thidansolla Dhevanudaiya Theerkkadharisigalum Irundhaargal.

3 akkaalaththile Nadhikku Ippuraththil Irukkira Naadugalukku Adhipadhiyaagiya Thadhnaai Enbavanum, Seththaar Posnaayum, Avargal Vagaiyaraavum Avargalidaththukku Vandhu, Indha Aalayaththaik Kattavum, Indha Madhilai Eduppikkavum Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyittavan Yaar Endru Avargalaik Kettaargal.
4 appozhudhu Adharku Etra Uththaravaiyum, Indha Maaligaiyaik Kattugira Manidharin Naamangalaiyum Avargalukku Sonnom.

5 aanaalum Indha Seydhi Thariyuvinidaththirkup Poi Ettugiravaraikkum Ivargal Yoodharudaiya Moopparin Velaiyaith Thadukkaadhapadikku, Avargaludaiya Dhevanin Kan Avargalmel Vaikkappattirundhadhu; Appozhudhu Idhaikkuriththu Avargal Sonna Marumozhiyaik Kadidhaththil Ezhudhiyanuppinaargal.

6 nadhikku Ippuraththilirukkira Thadhnaai Ennum Dhesaadhipadhiyum, Seththaar Posnaayum, Nadhikku Ippuraththilirukkira Apparchaagiyaraana Avan Vagaiyaraavum, Raajaavaagiya Thariyuvukku Ezhudhiyanuppina Kadidhaththin Nagalaavadhu:

8 naangal Yoodhar Seemaiyilulla Magaa Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukkupponom; Adhu Perunkarkalaal Kattappadugiradhu; Madhilgalinmel Uththirangal Paaichchappattu, Andha Velai Thurisaai Nadandhu, Avargalukkuk Kaikoodivarugiradhenbadhu Raajaavukkuth Theriyalaavadhaaga.
9 appozhudhu Naangal Avargal Mooppargalai Nokki: Indha Aalayaththaik Kattavum, Indha Madhilai Eduppikkavum Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyittadhu Yaar Endru Kettom.
10 idhuvumallaamal, Avargalukkulle Thalaivaraana Manidhar Innaarendru Ezhudhi Ariyappaduththumpadi Avargal Naamangal Ennavendrum Kettom.

11 avargal Engalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga, Naangal Paralogaththukkum Poologaththukkum Dhevanaayirukkiravarukku Adiyaaraayirundhu, Isravelin Periya Raajaa Oruvan Anega Varushangalukkumunne Kattiththeerththa Indha Aalayaththai Naangal Marupadiyum Kattugirom.

12 engal Pidhaakkal Paralogaththin Dhevanukkuk Kobamoottinapadiyinaal, Avar Ivargalai Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Ennum Kaldheyan Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar; Avan Indha Aalayaththai Nirmoolamaakki, Janaththai Baabilonukkuk Konduponaan.
13 aanaalum Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Koresin Mudhalaam Varushaththile, Kores Raajaavaanavar Dhevanudaiya Indha Aalayaththaik Kattumpadi Kattalaiyittaar.

14 nebugaadhnechchaar Erusalemirundha Dhevaalayaththilirundhu Eduththu, Baabilon Kovilil Kondupoi Vaiththirundha Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Pon Vellip Panimuttugalaiyum Raajaavaagiya Kores Baabilon Kovililirundhu Eduththu, Avar Dhesaadhipadhiyaaga Niyamiththa Sespaadhsaarennum Naamamullavanidaththil Avaigalai Oppuviththu,
15 avanai Nokki: Nee Indhap Panimuttugalai Eduththu, Erusalemilirukkira Dhevaalayaththukkuk Kondupo; Dhevanudaiya Aalayam Adhin Sthaanaththile Kattappadavendum Endraar.
16 appozhudhu Andha Sespaadhsaar Vandhu, Erusalemilulla Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Asthibaaraththaippottaan; Annaalmudhal Idhuvaraikkum Adhu Kattappattuvarugiradhu; Adhu Innum Mudiyavillai Endraargal.

17 ippozhudhum Raajaavukku Siththamaayirundhaal, Erusalemilulla Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththaik Katta Raajaavaagiya Kores Kattalaiyittadhundo Endru Baabilonil Irukkira Raajaavin Kajaanaavile Aaraaindhupaarkkavum, Indha Vishayaththil Raajaavinudaiya Siththam Innadhendru Engalukku Ezhudhiyanuppavum Uththaravaagavendum Endru Ezhudhiyanuppinaargal.
